LanguageData.GS_BloodTorch.label: blood torch
LanguageData.GS_BloodTorch.description: A specially-treated wooden torch that produces red light over a large area. The sanguine glow is particularly pleasing to individuals with the bloodfeeder gene.
LanguageData.GS_HolyTorch.label: holy torch
LanguageData.GS_HolyTorch.description: A specially-treated wooden torch that produces white light over a large area. The holy glow is particularly pleasing to individuals with the angelic halo gene.
LanguageData.GS_ToxTorch.label: tox torch
LanguageData.GS_ToxTorch.description: A specially-treated wooden torch that produces green light over a large area. The sickly glow is particularly pleasing to individuals with the pollution stimulus gene.
